user_question: What were the key technological advancements during World War I and generate an image of a trench warfare scene?
final_answer: Key technological advancements during World War I include tanks, machine guns, poison gas, and aircraft. Image of a trench warfare scene generated. These technologies increased casualties and led to a stalemate on the Western Front, changing warfare tactics and leading to trench warfare.
